title: Journeys into the unknown : Digital Storytelling project
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/HIV (Viruses)
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Life change events
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Life change events
abstract: Eight stories from HIV positive members of the community.
description: Eight members of the community tell their stories of living with HIV. With a fierce zest for life and adventure, they tell of how their lives have changed but also of how they have fought back against the disease and look forward to the journey ahead.
